title: Introduction to AkiraDocs
description: Learn about AkiraDocs, its key features, system requirements, and project structure
author: AkiraDocs Team

blocks.content: AkiraDocs is a modern documentation platform that combines the power of AI with traditional documentation workflows. It bridges the gap between developer teams who prefer working with Markdown/Git and content teams who need user-friendly interfaces.

- Modern block-based editor
- Git-based workflow
- AI-powered translations
- SEO optimization
- Multi-language support
- Real-time collaboration
- Version control
- Custom component support

- Node.js 18.x or higher
- Git 2.x or higher
- 4GB RAM minimum
- Modern web browser
- NPM or Yarn package manager
